CV Research Projects Notebook

Hi, I’m Lj Miranda and welcome to my blog!

I hailed from the Philippines and currently pursuing graduate studies in Waseda University, Japan. I’m a member of the Furuzuki Neurocomputing Systems Laboratory, where we study various algorithms that imitate nature. In this blog, I write about my interests in anything about artificial intelligence, machine learning, software development, and data science.
